Articles.Content: When making my channel, I decided to make a series revolving around taking some footage, new and old, slapping a title, some subtitles on it and a bit of a story in the description to spice it up.  I don't think I'm getting enough feedback to be able to really know what my viewers think about me and my channel so please tell me what you think, maybe leave a comment and tell what you want in the next episode. https://youtu.be/DKGGkJYGGh4
